languages.text: "В бездну правосудие. Я выверну тварь наизнанку раньше, чем ты начнешь нудеть про свои законы".
"To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start chattering about your precious Lex."
languages.original_text: "В бездну правосудие. Я выверну тварь наизнанку раньше, чем ты начнешь нудеть про свои законы".

traits.locale_text: "To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start jawing on about your Lex."
"To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start jawing on about your Lex."
"To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start chattering about your precious Lex."
"To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start chattering about your precious Lex."
"To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start chattering about your precious Lex."
"To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start chattering about your precious Lex."

languages.text: 「あなたの正義など虚空へ放り投げてやる！あなたが大事にしてるレックスの話を始める前に、あの野郎を内側から引き裂いてやるわ！」
languages.original_text: "To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start chattering about your precious Lex."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの正義など虚空へ放り投げてやる！あなたが大事にしてるレックスの話を始める前に、あの野郎を内側から引き裂いてやるわ！」

languages.text: "Zur Leere mit Eurer gerechten Strafe! Ich werde diesen Bastard auf links drehen, bevor Ihr auch nur anfangt, über Euer wertvolles Les zu reden."
languages.original_text: "To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start chattering about your precious Lex."

traits.locale_text: "Zur Leere mit Eurer gerechten Strafe! Ich werde diesen Bastard auf links drehen, bevor Ihr auch nur anfangt, über Euer wertvolles Les zu reden."

languages.text: «¡Al vacío la justicia! Destriparé a ese malnacido antes de que empiece a hablar de su dichosa Lex».
languages.original_text: "To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start chattering about your precious Lex."

traits.locale_text: «¡Al vacío la justicia! Destriparé a ese malnacido antes de que empiece a hablar de su dichosa Lex».

languages.text: “去他妈的正义制裁！我会赶在你念叨那些宝贝法律条款之前，把那个王八蛋的肠子掏出来。”
languages.original_text: "To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start chattering about your precious Lex."

traits.locale_text: “去他妈的正义制裁！我会赶在你念叨那些宝贝法律条款之前，把那个王八蛋的肠子掏出来。”

languages.text: "Adaletin uçsuzun dibine batsın! O şerefsizi sen daha o değerli Lex'in hakkında konuşamadan önce paramparça edeceğim."
languages.original_text: "To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start chattering about your precious Lex."

traits.locale_text: "Adaletin uçsuzun dibine batsın! O şerefsizi sen daha o değerli Lex'in hakkında konuşamadan önce paramparça edeceğim."

languages.original_text: "To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start chattering about your precious Lex."

languages.text: « Que le vide emporte votre justice ! Je retournerai cette ordure comme un gant avant même que vous ne commenciez à jacasser au sujet de votre précieuse Lex. »
languages.original_text: "To the void with your justice! I'll turn that bastard inside out before you even start chattering about your precious Lex."

traits.locale_text: « Que le vide emporte votre justice ! Je retournerai cette ordure comme un gant avant même que vous ne commenciez à jacasser au sujet de votre précieuse Lex. »
